headline: Experience Pune's Most Exclusive Rooftop Dining
headline_alternates: Dine with the City at Your Feet
Where Culinary Excellence Meets Panoramic Views
address: Vedriti 10th Floor, Pune Nagar Rd, near D'Mello Petrol Pump, opp. Tata Guardroom BRT Stop, Sai Nagari, Mathura Nagar, Wadgaon Sheri, Pune, Maharashtra 411014

about.title: The Family Behind the Experience
about.body: Perched on the 10th floor of Vedriti building, The Mafia Family Kitchen & Bar offers Pune's most captivating rooftop dining experience. Our mafia-themed restaurant combines dark, cinematic d√©cor with panoramic city views, creating an atmosphere that's both edgy and elegant. We serve a carefully curated menu featuring Italian classics, Continental favorites, and Indian specialties, complemented by signature cocktails crafted by our expert mixologists. Whether you're planning an intimate date night, celebrating with friends, or hosting a special occasion, our unique ambiance and exceptional cuisine make every meal memorable.

services.title: Rooftop Dining
services.description: Enjoy panoramic Pune city views from our 10th-floor terrace while savoring exceptional cuisine

services.title: Signature Cocktails
services.description: Expert mixologists craft unique cocktails and mocktails in our fully-stocked bar

services.title: Multi-Cuisine Menu
services.description: Authentic Italian, Continental, and Indian dishes prepared by our skilled chefs

services.title: Private Events
services.description: Perfect venue for celebrations, corporate events, and special occasions

services.title: Date Night Dining
services.description: Romantic ambiance with dim lighting and city views for unforgettable evenings

faq.question: Do I need a reservation?
faq.answer: Yes, we highly recommend making reservations, especially for weekends and special occasions. You can book through our website or call us directly.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: Yes, parking is available at the Vedriti building. We're also conveniently located near public transport with the BRT stop opposite our building.

faq.question: What is your dress code?
faq.answer: We maintain a smart casual dress code. While we don't require formal attire, we recommend avoiding shorts, flip-flops, and overly casual wear.

faq.question: Do you serve alcohol?
faq.answer: Yes, we have a full bar with signature cocktails, craft beers, wines, and premium spirits. We also offer mocktails for non-alcohol preferences.

faq.question: What cuisines do you offer?
faq.answer: Our menu features Italian classics, Continental favorites, and Indian specialties, all prepared with fresh ingredients and authentic flavors.

faq.question: Can I host a private party?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our rooftop space is perfect for private celebrations, corporate events, and group parties. Contact us to discuss customized packages.

faq.question: Is the rooftop covered?
faq.answer: Yes, our rooftop dining area has both covered and open sections, allowing you to enjoy the views regardless of weather conditions.

faq.question: What are your weekend hours?
faq.answer: We're open until 1:00 AM on Fridays and Saturdays, and until midnight on Sundays, perfect for late-night dining and drinks.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: The ambiance is absolutely stunning! The mafia theme with city views creates such a unique dining experience. The pasta was authentic and the cocktails were perfect.

testimonials.name: Rahul Mehta
testimonials.text: Best rooftop in Pune! Celebrated my anniversary here and the staff made it so special. The food quality and presentation exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Sneha Patel
testimonials.text: Loved the vibe and the panoramic city views. Great place for group celebrations - the service was excellent and the drinks were creative and delicious.

testimonials.name: Arjun Desai
testimonials.text: The dark, cinematic d√©cor creates such a cool atmosphere. Food was fantastic across all cuisines. Definitely our new favorite spot for weekend nights.

seo.title: The Mafia Family Kitchen & Bar - Rooftop Dining Pune
seo.description: Experience Pune's premier rooftop restaurant on 10th floor with panoramic city views, Italian-Continental-Indian cuisine, signature cocktails & mafia-themed ambiance.
seo.keywords: rooftop restaurant Pune, mafia themed restaurant, Italian food Pune, cocktails Pune, rooftop dining Wadgaon Sheri, panoramic city views, date night Pune
